document_data.caption: A map showing Keltarn Street and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Keltarn Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Keltarn Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Keltarn Street was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran east to west just south of [[Siren Lane]], connecting the much larger [[Street of Silver]] to the east with [[Swords Street]] to the west. Keltarn Street also intersected the [[Street of Silks]] near its midpoint.
